name: End-To-End Tests
motivation: A faulty ML model or pipeline shouldnâ€™t be allowed to be released and produce poor results in the app.
solution: Manual smoke testing is always useful, and keeping the tests fresh and up-to-date with new features, use cases and data is an ongoing task. ML model predictions are no different. If a part of the app is served by an ML model recommendation, identify the assertions that can be made
